fields.name: San Francisco Public Defender
fields.blurb: The San Francisco Public Defender's Clean Slate program helps people with arrests or convictions in San Francisco.
fields.long_confirmation_message: You will get a letter in the mail from the San Francisco Public Defender in 2-4 weeks.
fields.address:
San Francisco Public Defender
555 7th Street, 2nd Floor
San Francisco, CA
94103

fields.name: Contra Costa Public Defender
fields.blurb: The Contra Costa Public Defender's Clean Slate Program helps people with arrests or convictions in Conta Costa County.
fields.long_confirmation_message: The Contra Costa Public Defender will follow up with you if they need any other information.
fields.address:
Contra Costa Public Defender
800 Ferry Street
Martinez, CA
94553

fields.name: East Bay Community Law Center
fields.blurb: The East Bay Community Law Center offers legal services to low-income communities in the East Bay. EBCLC's Clean Slate Program helps people with arrests or convictions in Alameda County.
fields.short_confirmation_message: Next step in Alameda is to get your CA RAP sheet and send it to EBCLC. More info http://c4a.me/rap
fields.long_confirmation_message:
Your application for Alameda is not yet compete. If you do not have your California criminal record (RAP sheet), please follow these instructions to request it.
http://c4a.me/rap
fields.address:
East Bay Community Law Center
2921 Adeline St
Berkeley, CA
94703

fields.name: Alameda County Public Defender's Office
fields.blurb: The Clean Slate program of the Alameda County Public Defender's Office helps people with arrests or convictions in Alameda County.
fields.long_confirmation_message: The Alameda Public Defender will follow up with you if they need any other information.

fields.name: Monterey County Public Defender
fields.short_confirmation_message: The Monterey Public Defender will contact you in 1-2 weeks with your next steps.
fields.long_confirmation_message: The Monterey Public Defender will contact you in 1-2 weeks with your next steps.
